pageContext.claim: “I'm not giving up much.They've given up denuclearization, testing, research. We're going to close different sites. And I'm saying to myself, wait a minute. All of these things he's given up and we haven't even really that much asked them because we would have asked them but they gave it before I even asked.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump asserts, without evidence, that North Korea has already agreed to "denuclearization" and agreed to close nuclear sites. Many experts believe the North Korea seeks to freeze the status quo, which would mean Pyongyang would seek to keep its nuclear weapons.
